column5: HOLY JEEPERS it's December 1st today!?!?! man I work to hard haha i don't even know what day it is anymore....  C'mon, be honest, what's to do guys and gals want from Santa?  I"ll start...  1) Medium Heavy Baitcaster  2) Bow Mount Electric motor and  deep cycle Battery  3) Trailer hitch for the car!  I think i've been pretty good this year, but i'm not sure if Santa agrees with me!    Good Fishin' UF
